cqtc 0.3.8

Average triplicate observations

average_triplicates.Rd

Average triplicate observations

Usage

average_triplicates(obj)

Arguments

obj

A cqtc object.

Value

A cqtc object with the HR, RR, QT, QTCF, DQTCF fields averaged over ID, NTIME and CONC.

Examples

average_triplicates(quinidine_cqtc)
#> ----- c-QTc data set summary -----
#> Data from 21 subjects
#>
